channel.title: How to add prayer?
channel.description:
Can anyone help me with adding a good prayer that actually works. I mean when u activate the prayer the icon lights up. But it doesnt do anything. + i need to limit how much prayers of one type can be activated at once(ex: protect item and protect mage at the same time on?) So what i need help with is adding prayer and also adding the values and the head icons i need them to come up when u do smite , protects and so on.
Any lead or help would be greatly appreciated. :mad:
